verbs.description: forereckon (third-person singular simple present forereckons, present participle forereckoning, simple past and past participle forereckoned)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To reckon beforehand or in advance; prefigure
examples: The past is leaving us, the untried and unknown future is before us, and we can none of us forecast or forereckon what Seventynine, another twelve months, will bring to us and ours. What 1878 has been 1879 may not be, or vice versa ; [...]
